# Whip of Ants (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]], [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 6]], [[6th Level Witch Spells|Witch 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 11]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a square of red cloth)

**Range:** 0 ft.

**Effect:** Whiplike swarm

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D (see text)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 199

This spell functions as *[[Whip of Spiders (Spell)|whip of spiders]]*, except it summons army ants, and any creature you strike with the whip takes swarm damage as if it were attacked by an army ant swarm (3d6 points of damage plus poison and distraction, *Pathfinder RPG Bestiary* 16). If you transform the whip into an army ant swarm, it has 16 hit points.
